name: Bakarkhani Puff
description: A traditional layered, crispy, and slightly sweet or savory puff pastry, often circular, enjoyed with tea. Known for its flaky texture.

name: Butter Puff
description: A classic, light, and exceptionally flaky puff pastry with a rich buttery flavor. Perfect on its own or as an accompaniment.

name: Cheese Tie Puff
description: A savory puff pastry elegantly shaped like a tie, generously filled or topped with delicious melted cheese and herbs.

name: Chicken Cheese Patties
description: Golden, flaky puff pastry patties with a delectable filling of seasoned minced chicken and gooey melted cheese. A savory delight.

name: Chicken Patties
description: Crispy and golden puff pastry patties generously filled with a flavorful, well-seasoned minced chicken mixture. A classic savory snack.

name: French Heart Puff
description: Delicate, heart-shaped puff pastry (palmiers), caramelized with sugar for a sweet, crispy, and buttery treat. Also known as elephant ears.

name: French Heart Box
description: A delightful box filled with crispy, sweet, heart-shaped French puff pastries (palmiers). Perfect for sharing, gifting, or enjoying with coffee.

name: Lemon Puff
description: A light and zesty puff pastry, often filled with a tangy lemon curd or glazed with a sweet lemon icing for a refreshing bite.

name: Parsley Sticks Puff
description: Savory and crisp puff pastry sticks infused with fresh parsley and herbs, making for an elegant appetizer or a flavorful snack.

name: Spicy Puff
description: A flaky puff pastry with a zesty and spicy filling, often containing seasoned vegetables or meat, offering a flavorful kick.

name: U Puff
description: A uniquely U-shaped, flaky puff pastry, perfect for a light snack. Can be plain, sweet, or savory depending on the preparation.

name: Vegetable Cheese Pastry
description: A savory puff pastry delight, filled with a delicious mixture of seasoned mixed vegetables and melted cheese, baked to golden perfection.
